text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi gu Fherasiŋ, nde warir rɨvɨri. Nde paaŋ ze gi ntɨɨri ma. Nde Fhe Bakɨme piin ki gumgi gu mbigi ki ŋgu Hevenan veri thɨmkamani mpɨri gumgi ma. Nde vhɨra, nde nduarira ana vhen veri fhu. Nde gumgi gu mbigi mba ŋgun vhen ŋgirɨ za mbuim, nde mba tuav mpɨri. 23.13-14 Bigi kaŋgi gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Harigi kama mueŋ phorgap kha vezar ki. Mba kameŋ khaŋ muuŋgi, “Nde bigi kaŋgi gumgi gum Fherasiŋ, nde warir rɨvɨri. Nde paaŋ ze gi ntɨɨri ma. Nde mani rimgi mbigi nde mbe guiguigap mbe pheni kɨɨv nta ndi. Nde maaŋ mbuav, fhura guiguigap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav, buni mpeeiŋ nzuai. Nde zumgum Fhe Bakɨme za kha nuianan ki gumgi ga suaŋv suanga tugar, nde guigira simtɨga bakɨme ndirga.” Ndu Mak 12.40 ganɨri.
